p.e:
GEOMETRIC TOPOLOGY
LIKES FIGURING OUT HOW OBJECTS AND SPACES
MAP TO EACH OTHER.

YOU COULD SQUISH A CIRCLE INTO AN OVAL,
OR WRAP AN ENTIRE PLANE ONTO A SPHERE.

YOU COULD GLUE THE SIDES OF A SQUARE TOGETHER
TO GET A DONUT.

STRETCHING AND MRPHING IS COOL
AS LONG AS YOU KNOW HOW YOU DID IT,
AND AS LONG AS YOU DON'T SQUISH TOO MUCH.
